cast.name: 普里茜拉·赖斯 Priscila Reis
普里茜拉·布亚尔 Priscila Buiar

director.name: 娜塔莉·史密斯 Natalie Smith

trans_title: 我的笨蛋老婆失忆了—圣诞特别篇
introduction: Episódio 01In October 2021, months before Luiza's memory loss, Léo makes a naive request that deeply affects Valentina; and the day that was supposed to be a family one ends up in a painful argument between Catarina and her daughter.E02In December 2021, Valentina tries to control her frustration at not being able to present Leo with her request, while the others prepare to celebrate Christmas.E03The love between Luíza and Valentina is so strong that it is almost palpable, and, together with the Christmas spirit, this becomes even more evident. However, Christmas for both may not be as expected.E04On Christmas Eve, Valentina and her mother call a truce, putting aside their differences, while everyone has fun at the dinner table. And after a hidden friend full of laughter, Luíza tells Valentina that she is pregnant.
chinese_title: 我的笨蛋老婆失忆了—圣诞特别篇
